body:
*laughs at the cursebots because no one scrolls down enough to the comment sections of untranslated works*

Also most millennials probably couldn't wait till their boomer parents kick the bucket (to get that inheritance or whatnot), so don't threaten them with a good time!
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
